title: feat: economics dashboards — Daily Spending, Platform Load, tier-costs fixes
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Introduced comprehensive Daily Spending and Platform Load dashboards to visualize real-time infrastructure costs, revenue, and API traffic.
gist.impact: Ensures platform sustainability and performance reliability through better cost and load tracking, reinforcing our building-in-public philosophy.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee in a cozy 'mission control' room. The focus is on data visualization—pixelated charts, graphs, and trend lines glowing on screens. Represents the 'Economics' and 'Load' visibility.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee in a retro mission control room, studying glowing monitors with lime green (#ecf874) line graphs and bar charts. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky 8-bit consoles and data visualizations. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like a sci-fi strategy game. Nostalgic but beautiful.
